gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all available screen tabs to understand the current configuration of screens in my Jira project.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all screen tabs with their respective details, including tab IDs and names.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to get all tabs for a specific screen to ensure I am working with the correct fields in my issue types.
gold.ideal: The API should return a detailed list of tabs associated with the specified screen ID, including their names and positions.

gold.user: As a product owner, I want to add a new tab to a screen to organize fields better for my team.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully create a new tab under the specified screen and return the details of the newly created tab.

gold.user: As an administrator, I need to remove a tab from a screen that is no longer relevant to keep the UI clean.
gold.ideal: The API should delete the specified tab and confirm the deletion with a success message.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to rename a tab to better reflect its purpose for my team members.
gold.ideal: The API should update the tab name and return the updated tab details, confirming the change.

gold.user: As a UI designer, I want to rearrange the tabs on a screen to improve the user experience.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully move the specified tab to the new position and return the updated order of tabs.
